attributes.action: Immediately impose Economic & Political sanctions on Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current detention of Gillian Gibbons and the ongoing genocide in Dafur clearly demonstrate the despot nature of the Sudanese Government.

Immediately impose economic and political sanctions on this country until :-

a. Gillian Gibbons is released
b. Genocide in Dafur is stopped
